sentences: Nelly Moretto (20 September 1925 – 24 November 1978) was an Argentine composer and pianist.
She was born in Rosario, Argentina, and studied at the National Conservatory and the Torcuato di Tella Institute in Buenos Aires, and at the University of Illinois.
She worked for a time at the electronic studio Estudio de Fonología Musical (EFM) at the University of Buenos Aires.
Composición 9a for two instrumental groups, tape, dance and lights, 1965
Coribattenti for string quartet and tape, 1967
In Memorian J. C. Paz for trumpet and tape, 1972
Composición No.14: Bah! le dije al tiempo for violin, trumpet, piano and tape, 1974/1975
